example.eg: It's explicitly stated in your contract that you must carry insurance.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清晰地，清楚地, 充分说明地，详细论述地

example.eg: He declared explicitly that he was an alcoholic.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 毫无保留地, 直率地

example.eg: It came to light that she had been photographed explicitly in college.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 赤裸裸地，毫不掩饰地，露骨地
